name: crochet giraffe
notes:
this pattern is a fantastic stash buster!

make your crochet stripy giraffe with medium weight yarn and a 4 mm (g) crochet hook for a finished giraffe measuring approximately 19 inches x 12 inches wide. i used 12 mm safety eyes on my worsted weight giraffes (i've crocheted 3 now!). 

this is still my daughter's favorite crocheted toy!

this pattern was designed by emma dent. emma dent has retired her i love buttons blog and she has transferred the pattern to the oombawka design crochet blog. the pattern is now available at oombawka design crochet.

> thanks for all the lovely comments he has had. emma :)
